events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th, requesting to file a claim for the damages sustained by the car.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the nature of the reported vehicle collision and related damages.
An agent specialized in auto insurance claims was assigned to handle the case to ensure responsive and accurate processing of the customer's request.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and informing about the next steps to provide necessary documentation.
Requested the customer to submit accident reports, vehicle repair estimates, and photos of the collision damage for claim verification purposes.
Customer uploaded all requested vehicle accident documents including police report, repair quotes, and damage photographs through the online portal.
The investigation into the vehicle collision claim was initiated with an adjuster assigned to review all submitted documents and assess liability.
Completed thorough investigation on the auto accident claim confirming the collision details and validating coverage eligibility under the policy.
A settlement offer was made to the customer outlining the approved amount for vehicle repair costs and associated damages after claim validation.
The customer expressed gratitude for the timely settlement proposal and confirmed satisfaction with the responsiveness of the claims team.
The auto accident claim was formally approved based on the investigation results and agreed settlement terms with the insured party.
Payment for the approved settlement was disbursed to the customer to cover the vehicle repair expenses as per the claim agreement.
Finalized and closed the auto accident claim after successful payment and confirmation of repair progress from the customer.
The case file was archived in the system for record-keeping and future reference following completion of all claim procedures.
